Joyce Ababio (amụrụ na 1988) bụ onye mmebe ejiji nke Ghana
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Joyce Ababio College of Fashion Design
Joyce Ababio gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Achimota
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ nwetara nnabata na mahadum St
Cloud State University na Minnesota, USA
Agbanyeghị nke a, ka otu afọ gachara na mmụta teknụzụ ahụike o mere, ya na ndị ndụmọdụ ya kwurịtara okwu wee bufee ya na Mahadum Texas Woman’s University ebe ọ nwetara nzere ya na Nhazi Ejiji
N'afọ 2013, ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ aha ya bụ Joyce Ababio College of Creative Design (JACCD) na Accra, Ghana
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị ọ rụzuru gụnyere:
